long_description: Armed with a rainfly, removable hip belt and hidden-from-the-public-eye zipper pockets, the Timbuk2 Aviator Travel Pack has sophisticated styling that works downtown or way out of town. Converts from suitcase to backpack with stowaway padded straps and removable hipbelt. Laptop pocket fits up to a 17 in. MacBook Pro. Expandable top compartment separately holds shoes and toiletries. Full-zip main compartment provides the easy access of a duffel. Two external zip pockets hold smartphone, wallet and passport. Made from reinforced tarpaulin and durable nylon; rainfly lives in a dedicated pocket. External compressions straps; grab handles on all sides. Padded, ventilated back panel on the Timbuk2 Aviator Travel Pack lets you hike trails or wear from train station to hotel in comfort. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
short_description: Armed with a rainfly, removable hip belt and hidden-from-the-public-eye zipper pockets, the Timbuk2 Aviator Travel Pack has sophisticated styling that works downtown or way out of town.
